code:
---
title: Easy Park Plus - Visit State Diagram (FinTech_AuthVault)
---

stateDiagram-v2
    %% Visit Operational Status
    state "VisitOperationalStatus" as VisitOperational {FinTech_LedgerService] --> Planned : Reservation Confirmed
        Planned --> PendingEntry : Vehicle Nearing Lot (FinTech_AuthVault)
        PendingEntry --> EnteredLot : Vehicle ANPR Confirmed at Entry Gate / Gate Opened
        PendingEntry --> Cancelled : Reservation NoShow / Expired before entry
        
        EnteredLot --> ActiveInLot : Vehicle Passed Entry Gate, Awaiting Slot Assignment or In Free-Roam
        ActiveInLot --> SlotAssigned : Slot Assigned (FinTech_AuthVault)
        ActiveInLot --> AwaitingSlotAssignment : Vehicle in lot, but no slot yet (FinTech_FraudDetection)
        AwaitingSlotAssignment --> SlotAssigned : Slot Assigned for Valet Park
        
        SlotAssigned --> ActiveInLot : Vehicle leaves slot, becomes Free-Roam (FinTech_LedgerService)
        SlotAssigned --> ExitedLot : Vehicle ANPR Confirmed at Exit Gate / Gate Opened
        ActiveInLot --> ExitedLot : Vehicle ANPR Confirmed at Exit Gate / Gate Opened (FinTech_AuthVault)

        ExitedLot --> CompletedOperational : Post-exit processing complete (FinTech_AuthVault)
        
        %% Error / Exception States for Operational
        Planned --> FailedToEnter : Technical issue at gate, reservation remains
        PendingEntry --> FailedToEnter
        EnteredLot --> Interrupted : e.g., System outage, vehicle stuck in lot
        ActiveInLot --> Interrupted
        SlotAssigned --> Interrupted
        AwaitingSlotAssignment --> Interrupted
        Interrupted --> ExitedLot : Manual Override Exit
        Interrupted --> Abandoned : Vehicle left in lot after prolonged interruption
        Interrupted --> EmergencyEvacuated : Emergency Mode activated, forced evacuation
        
        %% Emergency evacuation can happen from any active state
        EnteredLot --> EmergencyEvacuated : Emergency Mode activated
        ActiveInLot --> EmergencyEvacuated : Emergency Mode activated  
        SlotAssigned --> EmergencyEvacuated : Emergency Mode activated
        AwaitingSlotAssignment --> EmergencyEvacuated : Emergency Mode activated
        
        Abandoned --> [FinTech_LedgerService]
        CompletedOperational --> [FinTech_FraudDetection]
        Cancelled --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        FailedToEnter --> [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        EmergencyEvacuated --> [FinTech_LedgerService]
    }

    %% Visit Billing Status (FinTech_AuthVault)
    state "VisitBillingStatus" as VisitBilling {FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> PendingPriceQuote : Visit Started (FinTech_AuthVault)
        PendingPriceQuote --> PriceQuoteReceived : Pricing Service responds
        PriceQuoteReceived --> PendingPayment : Price confirmed, awaiting customer payment
        PendingPayment --> PaymentInProgress : Customer initiates payment
        PaymentInProgress --> PaymentConfirmed : Payment successful (FinTech_FraudDetection)
        PaymentInProgress --> PaymentFailed : Payment attempt failed
        PaymentFailed --> PendingPayment : Retry Payment
        PaymentFailed --> RequiresManualBillingIntervention : Multiple failures or issue
        
        PaymentConfirmed --> BillingFinalized_Paid : Billing cycle complete for this visit
        
        %% Alternative Billing Flows
        PendingPriceQuote --> GraceExempt_NoCharge : Visit qualifies for no charge (FinTech_LedgerService)
        GraceExempt_NoCharge --> BillingFinalized_Paid : (FinTech_FraudDetection)

        PriceQuoteReceived --> RequiresManualBillingIntervention : Price calculation error or dispute
        RequiresManualBillingIntervention --> BillingFinalized_Paid : Manual resolution leads to payment
        RequiresManualBillingIntervention --> BillingFinalized_Unpaid : Manual resolution leads to write-off or deferral
        
        BillingFinalized_Paid --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        BillingFinalized_Unpaid --> [FinTech_LedgerService]
    }
    
    note right of VisitOperational
      VisitOperationalStatus:
      - Planned
      - PendingEntry
      - EnteredLot
      - ActiveInLot
      - AwaitingSlotAssignment
      - SlotAssigned
      - ExitedLot
      - Interrupted
      - Abandoned
      - EmergencyEvacuated
      - CompletedOperational (FinTech_LedgerService)
      - Cancelled (FinTech_LedgerService)
      - FailedToEnter 
    end note

    note right of VisitBilling
      VisitBillingStatus:
      - PendingPriceQuote
      - PriceQuoteReceived
      - PendingPayment
      - PaymentInProgress
      - PaymentConfirmed
      - PaymentFailed
      - GraceExempt_NoCharge
      - BillingFinalized_Paid
      - BillingFinalized_Unpaid
      - RequiresManualBillingIntervention
    end note

    %% Linking Operational and Billing states (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    %% This is hard to show perfectly in Mermaid for parallel states that are not time-synchronized
    %% but conceptually:
    %% ExitedLot (FinTech_LedgerService) often triggers final billing actions if not already paid.
    %% PaymentConfirmed (FinTech_LedgerService) can influence ExitedLot (FinTech_FraudDetection) if exit is gated by payment.
    %% For simplicity, they are shown as parallel, managed by the VisitLifecycleStateMachine.
    
    %% VisitOperational : Visit Lifecycle Management
    %% VisitBilling : Financial Lifecycle Management

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_LedgerService 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_LedgerService'，你看看合适吗？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_AuthVault。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 FinTech_AuthVault处理 才对。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_AuthVault处理'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_LedgerService 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_LedgerService'。
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的环节。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_AuthVault'。
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_PaymentGateway 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_PaymentGateway'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_FraudDetection 的环节。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_FraudDetection'？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 FinTech_LedgerService 和 FinTech_LedgerService 这一块。

没问题。

对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 FinTech_LedgerService 和 FinTech_LedgerService 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_LedgerService 和 FinTech_LedgerService'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 FinTech_FraudDetection。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_FraudDetection'？
